pr_title: Move AbstractModel static methods to ModelUtils

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, I  know the original issue said ModelUtils But I wonder if we should create some separate StorageUtils or VolumeUtils class or something instead of just moving the methods from one gigantic class to another one.
timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: @scholzj Good idea. I will split the ModelUtils into another class.
replies.author: xsreality
